footer.address: Address: Uzbekistan, Tashkent city, Chilanzar district, Obod massif, Istiqlol street, 23A.

integration.title: Work with us
integration.partner_text: Join our platform and reach thousands of customers.

questions.title: Frequently asked questions
questions.q1_title: How do I order through the Fasgo app?
questions.q1_text: Download the app, register, select a dish from the menu and click the "Order" button. We'll take care of the rest!
questions.q2_text: Depending on the location and the busyness of the restaurant, delivery takes an average of 30-45 minutes.
questions.q3_text: You can pay with any bank card or in cash through the courier.
questions.q4_title: What if the food doesn't arrive or there's a problem?
questions.q4_text: Contact customer support – we will quickly solve the problem or refund your money.
questions.q5_title: What kind of food is available?
questions.q5_text: Fasgo has thousands of dishes from national, fast food, vegetarian, Asian, European cuisines – a new choice every day!
